description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Cagliari vs Lazio in the Serie A
title: Cagliari vs Lazio: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Cagliari vs Lazio: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt missed. Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Matteo Prati with a cross.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
